trans-unit.source: Contains all the localizable resources in a BAML record.
trans-unit.target: 包含 BAML 記錄中所有可當地語系化的資源。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary contains a mapping from resource keys (specified as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey> objects) to resource values (specified as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResource> objects).
trans-unit.target: 字典包含對應的資源索引鍵 (指定為<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey>物件) 為資源值 (指定為<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResource>物件)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A key for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含資源的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item with the provided key and value to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 將具有所提供之索引鍵和值的項目加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An item with the same key already exists.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同索引鍵的項目已經存在。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all resources from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 物件刪除所有資源。

trans-unit.source: The resource key to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的資源索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> object contains a resource with a specified key.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 物件是否包含具有指定索引鍵的資源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> object contains a resource with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 物件包含具有指定索引鍵的資源則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to hold the data.
trans-unit.target: 要保留資料的物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting index value.
trans-unit.target: 起始索引值。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> object to a one-dimensional array of <see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" /> objects, starting at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 物件的內容複製至 <see cref="T:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry" /> 物件的一維陣列，從指定的索引處開始複製。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> exceeds the destination array length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> 超過目的陣列長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Copy cannot fit in the remaining array space between <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> and the destination array length.
trans-unit.target: 複本無法存入 <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> 和目的地陣列長度之間剩餘的陣列空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of localizable resources in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 中可當地語系化資源的數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of localizable resources.
trans-unit.target: 可當地語系化資源的數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 中逐一查看的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A specialized <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionaryEnumerator" /> that can iterate the contents of the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 特製化的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionaryEnumerator" />，可以用來逐一查看字典的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> object has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 物件的大小是否固定。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 物件是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The key value of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a localizable resource specified by its key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由其索引鍵指定之可當地語系化的資源。

trans-unit.source: The value of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the keys in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 物件中的所有索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the keys in the object.
trans-unit.target: 集合，包含物件中的所有索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key for the resource to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之資源的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Removes a specified localizable resource from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 移除指定之可當地語系化的資源。

trans-unit.source: key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the root element, if it is localizable.
trans-unit.target: 取得根項目 (Root Element) 的索引鍵 (如果該項目可當地語系化的話)。

trans-unit.source: The key of the root element, if it is localizable.
trans-unit.target: 根項目的索引鍵 (如果該項目可當地語系化的話)。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the value is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會將值設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set some properties for the entire page by adding or modifying the properties of its root element, due to the effects of property inheritance for dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定整個頁面中的某些屬性，藉由新增或修改內容的根項目，因為相依性屬性的屬性繼承的效果。

trans-unit.source: For example, changing the root element's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property sets that property for every element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，變更的根項目<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>屬性會設定該屬性的每個項目頁面上。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items.
trans-unit.target: 以零起始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，可接收複製的項目。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的第一個位置，將接收複製來的內容。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數目

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用以同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The object value to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 的物件值。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add(System.Object,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add(System.Object,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 要在字典中尋找的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Contains(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Contains(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 中找到 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可用於逐一查看集合的列舉程式物件。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要取得或設定之項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: The item with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之索引鍵的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Remove(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IDictionary.Remove(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 物件，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the values in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary" /> 中的所有值。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the values in the object.
trans-unit.target: 集合，包含物件中的所有值。
